plot: A man visits an old and decayed movie theater every day to watch the same film: "The Snow and So Many Things", an apparently mundane Argentinian melodrama from the fifties.
title: La nieve y tantas cosas
plot_es: A man visits an old and decayed movie theater every day to watch the same film: "The Snow and So Many Things", an apparently mundane Argentinian melodrama from the fifties.
plot_en: A man visits an old and decayed movie theater every day to watch the same film: "The Snow and So Many Things", an apparently mundane Argentinian melodrama from the fifties.
